vEqdhasa#H |
pUqShNastAnyapi# vraqta i#ndravAqyU vi mu#~jcatAM ||
aBi#nnO GaqrmO jIqradA#nuqryataq Attaqstada#gaqn puna#H |
iqddhmO vEdi#H pariqdhaya#Scaq sarvE# yaqj~jasyA&&yuqranuq saM ca#ranti ||
traya#stri(gm) Saqttanta#vOq yE vi#tatniqrE ya iqmaM ~Myaqj~ja(gg) svaqdhayAq dada#ntEq tEShA$M CiqnnaM pratyEqtadda#dhAmiq svAhA# GaqrmO dEqvA(gm) apyE#tu || 46
(aShA#Dhaq-OSha#dhaya-upaciqnvantiq-pa~jca#catvAri(gm)Sacca) (A10)
